seo-desc: Independent web developer with {{yearsJSExp}} years of experience in JavaScript technologies
p-1: My name is Clément DOUIN, I am a {{yearsOld}} years old independent web developer with {{yearsJSExp}} years of experience in JavaScript technologies.
p-2: I have been developping applications for more than {{yearsDevExp}} years. I started with C, Java and Visual Basic. Then I switched to web technologies with TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, and more lately Rust. I discovered functional programming with Haskell/OCaml/Elm and devops with Docker/Nix.
p-3-1: I work now as a freelance web developer. My expertise makes me highly autonomous in all kind of projects, both frontend (UX, integration, application) and backend (API, perfs, devops). Feel free to
p-3-2: if you need any further information!
